marketing: Individuals who want to help search for funding. This is a massive project, which will require massive resources to construct.
engineering: Mechanical engineers to design a large free-standing machine to "paint" a new image on the side of a building each day.
Computer scientists to program the mechanism.
design: Designers to make the end result look visually appealing.

project_goal: Build a giant robotic mural that periodically updates itself.

project_leaders.name: Matt Lewis
project_leaders.bio: Matt is a senior studying computer engineering. He is passionate about graphic design, music, and human-focused development. In his spare time, he enjoys working on projects that fuse hardware, software, and art.

project_leaders.name: Scott Sievert
project_leaders.bio: Scott is a junior studying electrical engineering who enjoys math, user-interface design and is slightly passionate about skiing. He's normally found in Keller Hall.
